data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Brahamanbaria to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Brahamanbaria, Chittagong, Bangladesh

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 2,840,500 souls living in the county of Brahamanbaria with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Brahamanbaria to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 3,558 believers in Brahamanbaria, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Nagarchi (Hindu traditions) people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 3,558 believers in Brahamanbaria.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the county of Brahamanbaria to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.section_summary:
the county of Brahamanbaria, Chittagong, Bangladesh has a population of 2,840,500.

We estimate Brahamanbaria has 3,558 people who might know Jesus, 8,522 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,828,420 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the county of Brahamanbaria against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

location.name: Brahamanbaria
location.people_groups_list: Mal (Muslim traditions), Munshi, Rai, Kahar (Muslim traditions), Banjara (Muslim traditions)
